text: @WhiteHouse Does this sound right? Barbers and hair salons essential? Is there a way to do hair from 6 feet away? Is the hair cloth changed for a clean one every time. Is the lose hair removed from the air or surface completely between every customer? https://t.co/PipSHBQWJR
